resources:
yAssess 2023 Splash Image Preview Area Capture If invited on email:

1. Enter the email id on which the invitation has been sent
2. Login with your credentials or Register yourself
3. Give Test If you have passkeys:

1. Enter Passkey
2. Login with your credentials or Register yourself
3. Give Test 				 INSTRUCTIONS
 		

•	This is a self adaptive intelligent test.
 		

•	This test has 20 questions.
 		

•	It will take approximately 40 minutes to attempt all the questions.
 		

•	You will see 1 question at a time. All questions are compulsory. You cannot skip any question.
 		

•	You will get only one attempt at all questions. A question once attempted will not appear again.
 		

•	Please note that this examination does not constitute any offer of employment by any/all participating organization.
 		

•	Your admission to this examination is strictly provisional. Before giving an examination please ensure that you are eligible according to eligibility criteria.
 		

•	While the assessment is going on, Youth4Work monitors every activity:
 						

•	Your browsing movements.
 						

•	Time taken to attempt each question.
 						

•	Your IP address
 		

•	If at any time during the assessments, you move away from the browser tab, your assessment ends and your score will be calculated based on the questions attempted till that time.
 		

•	Hence, do not minimize the assessment tab or open new tab, or copy any question, etc.
 		

•	You will be visually monitored through your webcam. Random photos will be clicked during the course of assessment to check for any fraud.
 		

•	You will be solely responsible for any malpractice.
 		

•	In case of internet breakdown, you will not be able to proceed. Take a screenshot of the page you are on with the clock for time stamp and send on support@youth4work.com
 

If you have read and understood the instructions please click "OK, BEGIN TEST" button
Service not available No address found Confirm Next

 You can't resume later. Quitting will submit the test.
 You can resume later. Your assessment has been forwarded to the organisation that invited you for it. You will be notified for next steps according to your result and profile Hope you had a good experience and good wishes for your future. Sorry, Now you cannot attempt the test any more, You tried to minimize/change the screen/window. Result is Submitting only for questions you have attempted.
